Name: [Affinity] Lady-Like Charge
Desc: Lucy has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Fierce Fangs of Fire]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Lucy and her boars have had a good rest, and were all bursting with energy.
